main.name: Coding Lessons With Kshitiz
main.description: Embark on your programming journey with me and learn to build applications that can help them keep up with the IT boom our world is witnessing today
main.bio: I am software engineer who currently works in Synoptek. Due to Work From Home I am currently staying in Uganda. During my stay in Uganda I have realized the passion of multiple students to learn programming that can help them build websites and applications that can benefit them in the future.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.
